title-group.article-title: On the Transcription of Musical Sound by Computer

abstract.p: An examination of the problem of producing a written score from a piece of polyphonic music has been done with the result that a program to accomplish this end for a restricted class of input samples has been written and debugged. The program uses bandpass filtering to extract individual harmonic data. Two examples are presented here that show the viability of the system given the restrictions on the music under analysis.
